demo1_1_0.zh: 准备步骤1: 初始化 SDK
demo1_1_0.en: Welcome to ANP SDK! This guide will help you get started with the basic features of the SDK.

demo1_1_1.zh: 从配置文件加载智能体的身份文档和密钥文件夹，用于创建智能体的localagent实例
demo1_1_1.en: The SDK configuration file contains important parameters such as host address, port number, and debug mode.

demo1_1_2.zh: 在每个智能体的localagent实例上通过装饰器/注册函数定制智能体自己的api和消息处理接口
demo1_1_2.en: The SDK configuration file contains important parameters such as host address, port number, and debug mode.

demo1_1_3.zh: 将localagent注册到SDK服务器上,这样发向指定智能体的请求将被SDK服务器路由到智能体在localagent实例上注册的处理函数。
demo1_1_3.en: The SDK configuration file contains important parameters such as host address, port number, and debug mode.

demo1_1_4.zh: 启动SDK服务器, 等待其他智能体的连接。
demo1_1_4.en: SDK provides core APIs including creating agents, sending messages, and registering handlers.

demo2_1_0.zh: 我们将演示如何使用ANP SDK的基本功能。首先是创建智能体所需的身份文档和密钥文件夹。
demo2_1_0.en: Welcome to ANP SDK! This guide will help you get started with the basic features of the SDK.

demo2_1_1.zh: 通过did_create_user函数,在anp_open_sdk/anp_users目录下创建用户目录。包含了用户的身份文档和密钥文件。
demo2_1_1.en: The SDK configuration file contains important parameters such as host address, port number, and debug mode.

3.zh: SDK提供创建智能体、发送消息、注册处理器等核心API。
3.en: SDK provides core APIs including creating agents, sending messages, and registering handlers.
